prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that looks like a fish with vibrant colors and unique fins.
I want an aquatic Pokemon that has a playful personality and is often found in freshwater.
Generate a Pokemon design that features bright orange scales and large white fins.
Make a small fish-like Pokemon with a round body and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a simple fish into a majestic water creature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of resilience and adaptability in aquatic habitats.
Show me a humorous Pokemon that struggles but eventually becomes powerful after evolving.
